title: Create Official KimchiDAO Telegram group/channel
body:
# General idea
Good, active social media channels are a must for any project.

We have already established a few social media channels, but we are still missing official Telegram channels.

There are very active crypto related groups and channels on Telegram. Although the crypto channels are just a small portion of the more than 500 million monthly active users that Telegram has.

# Purpose
The purpose of the Telegram channels is to: 
+ provide a moderated place for TG users to learn more about the Kimchi project and discuss all things Kimchi related
+ synchronize important information between the TG channels and the KimchiDAO Discord channel

# What
We will need two different TG channels to meet our needs. 
+ One channel will be a discussion group channel.
+ The other channel will be an announcements channel.   

# Who
@as7777 has generously offered to manage the official KimchiDAO Telegram Groups. 

# Proposal Question
Should KimchiDAO create official Telegram groups?
choices: No, do not create official TG
author: 0x49aD1457F299da4303789a28dd730e315752378d
